name: Warp Warp Warp!!! Inspired by Portal
name_original: Warp Warp Warp!!! Inspired by Portal
description:
Controls

Left click to shoot

A,D to move

W to jump

R to restart level

ESC to go back to menu

ENTER to pause

Q to switch quality

A puzzle-platform in 2D, inspired by Portal the first-person shooting game.

A high-speed platform game that utilize warping mechanics that are inspired by portal.  It has a similar gameplay to sonic the hedgehog and contains gravity shifting puzzles found in other games such as Mario. 

Level Editor 

Leave comments below if you want to try the Level Editor and create your own level. I will set up a online level editor to create and play or share.
